text: to te loko temane juthalavata rahya, basa! Ame temane ane je loko temani sathe jahajamam savara hata, (prakopathi) bacavi lidha ane te lokone nayaba banavi didha ane je loko'e amari ayatone juthalavi hati te lokone dubadi didha. To tame ju'o te lokoni dasa kevi tha'i? Je lokone saceta karavamam avya hata
